mmorpg.chat.alt_to_show_other_spell: Press [Alt] to show the other Skill.
mmorpg.chat.too_low_level_to_upgrade_spe: Your level is too low to upgrade the Skill level.
mmorpg.chat.not_mns_weapon: You need a Mine and Slash Weapon (imbued with stats) to cast Skills.
mmorpg.chat.no_duplicate_aura: You can't equip duplicate Augment Gems.
mmorpg.chat.lack_aura_capacity: You lack the Augment capacity to equip all these Augments.
mmorpg.word.increasespelllevel: Unlock this Support Gem Slot by increasing your Skill Level!
mmorpg.word.jewel_desc: Items that boost a player's stats if socketed into the Jewel GUI.
mmorpg.word.support_gems_also_benefit: Support Gems from this Skill also benefit: %1$s
mmorpg.word.cast_fail_msgs:
Will print helpful messages when you fail to cast a skill.
Particularly Helpful for New Players!
Players below level 15 can't disable this option.
mmorpg.word.everyone_is_ally:
By default your skills only target your Mine and Slash team members and yourself.

With this enabled, your heals, buffs, etc., will target even un-teamed players!
mmorpg.chat.destroys_output: When Placed in a Profession Station with other inputs/materials, it will make all recipes produced give 2X the EXP but it will destroy the output.
library_of_exile.item_requirement.is_map: Must be a Dungeon Map Item
library_of_exile.item_requirement.map_ha: Map Rarity Must be Lower than Mythic
mmorpg.profession.desc.husbandry: Bounty Hunting enables you to take on tasks from the Bountiful Boards for rewards, including Cooking Profession Meats.
mmorpg.gui.master_backpack_loot_button: Transfer Eligible Items to Master Backpack
mmorpg.chat.must_be_in_map_to_accept_pro: You must be inside the same Map to accept Prophecy Rewards
mmorpg.chat.not_enough_favor_to_buy_prop: Not enough Prophecy Coins to claim the reward. Gain more Coin by killing Map mobs while afflicted with Prophecy Curses.
mmorpg.chat.prophecies_guide:
1) Kill mobs while cursed to gain Prophecy Coins.

2) Curses multiply the number of Coins you earn from kills. 

3) You can claim Prophecy rewards with your Coins below. 

4) Your Coins and Prophecy Curses reset upon entering another Map.
mmorpg.chat.prophecy_altar_msg: The altar reacted to your touch! You can now open the Prophecies menu in the Hub and choose a Prophecy Curse to apply to yourself.
mmorpg.chat.prophecy_please_spend: You currently have a Prophecy Curse choice pending. Please select a Curse from the Prophecy menu first before using this altar.
mmorpg.word.prophecyplayeraffixinfo: Your rate of §eProphecy Coins§r gain will increase.

mmorpg.stat_desc.dodge: Chance to ignore attack damage. This is lowered by Accuracy.

mmorpg.stat_desc.armor_penetration: Ignores a flat amount of the target's Armor. Against common mobs, full Armor Penetration is roughly 3x your level.

mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_chance: Chance to cause Bleed on §6☀ Physical§7§9 Hits. Bleed deals 120% of the damage as §6☀ Physical§7§9 Damage over 5s. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_chance: Chance to cause Burn on §c☀ Fire§7§9 Hits. Burn deals 100% of the damage as §c☀ Fire§7§9 Damage over 3s. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.electrify_chance: Chance to cause Electrify on §e☀ Lightning§7§9 Hits. Accumulates 100% of the damage which can be activated with SHOCK to deal bonus §e☀ Lightning§7§9 Damage. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.freeze_chance: Chance to cause Freeze on §b☀ Cold§7§9 Hits. Slows target and accumulates 85% of the damage which can be activated with SHATTER to deal bonus §b☀ Cold§7§9 Damage. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_chance: Chance to cause Poison on §5☀ Chaos§7§9 Hits. Deals 150% of the damage as §5☀ Chaos§7§9 Damage over 10s. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.

mmorpg.stat.chance_of_slow: §7Your §6☀ Physical§7 Attacks have §a[VAL1]%§7 chance of applying Lethargy
spell.desc.fury:
§6This buff is needed for the rest of the Brawler Skills!§7

Empower yourself with wrath, giving your basic attacks the chance to generate a Combo Starter stack, which is used to use Brawler Skills.
spell.desc.eighth_gate:
Open your inner gate and deal [calc:eighth_gate] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to yourself to immediately gain a Combo Extender stack.

§oIncreases to Damage and Critical Hits don't apply to Damage caused to self. You can still die from self-damage!§r
spell.desc.piercing_strike:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Starter stack.§7

Quickly strike the area in front of you, dealing [calc:piercing_strike] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit also take increased §6☀ Physical§7 Damage for a short duration.

§aGenerates a Combo Linker stack.§7
spell.desc.debilitating_blow:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Starter stack.§7

Assault the area in front of you, dealing [calc:debilitating_blow] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to enemies in the area. Enemies hit are also slowed and have their Damage reduced for a short duration.

§aGenerates a Combo Linker stack.§7
spell.desc.goading_strike:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Starter stack.§7

Deal [calc:goading_strike] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to enemies in front of you and taunt them. Enemies caught also gain increased Damage Taken, and have their Dodge Rating reduced.

§aGenerates a Combo Linker stack.§7
spell.desc.elemental_assault:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Starter stack.§7

Blast the area in front of you with the elements, dealing [calc:elemental_assault] §c☀ Fire§7, §b☀ Cold§7, and §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage. Upon use, your §6☀ Physical§7 Damage is converted to the elements for a short duration.

§aGenerates a Combo Linker stack.§7
spell.desc.sweeping_blow:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Starter stack.§7

Sweep the area around you with a kick, stunning enemies and dealing [calc:sweeping_blow] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage. Enemies hit also get pulled to you.

§aGenerates a Combo Linker stack.§7
spell.desc.triple_blitz:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Linker stack.§7

Rapidly strike enemies in front of you three times, with each hit dealing [calc:triple_blitz] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage.

§aGenerates a Combo Extender stack.§7
spell.desc.rallying_sweep:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Linker stack.§7

Perform a sweeping kick around you, dealing [calc:rallying_sweep] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to nearby enemies. Additionally, nearby allies gain increased Damage and Move Speed.

§aGenerates a Combo Extender stack.§7
spell.desc.anti_gravity_smash:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Linker stack.§7

Slam the ground in front of you, damaging enemies for [calc:anti_gravity_smash_initial] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage, and causing a black hole to arise from above and come crashing down. Enemies caught in the black hole rapidly take [calc:anti_gravity_smash] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.

§aGenerates a Combo Extender stack.§7
spell.desc.flowing_river_rush:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Linker stack.§7

Fire a cold blast which deals [calc:flowing_river_rush] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to enemies hit, and upon expiry, teleport you to the cold blast. Additionally, the explosion will apply Stun to nearby enemies and form a pool of freezing water which deals [calc:flowing_river_rush] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage per second.

§aGenerates a Combo Extender stack.§7
spell.desc.spirit_offensive:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Linker stack.§7

Fire a piercing spirit orb which deals [calc:spirit_offensive] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage to enemies hit. Once the orb reaches the end of its path, it returns to where it was fired, once again dealing [calc:spirit_offensive] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage. Additionally, whenever the orb hits an enemy, it heals you for [calc:spirit_offensive_heal] Health.

§aGenerates a Combo Extender stack.§7
spell.desc.raging_dragon:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Extender stack.§7

Strike in front with the force of a raging dragon, sending out a massive fire blast which deals [calc:raging_dragon] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage every 4 ticks in an area around it.
spell.desc.glacial_phoenix:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Extender stack.§7

Punch the ground in front of you, dealing [calc:glacial_phoenix] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to enemies. Due to impact, the area remains shattered, causing ice shards to fall from the sky. Each ice shard deals [calc:glacial_phoenix] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to any enemies caught in their path. The area in which the ice shards appear is not affected by modifiers to Area of Effect. However, the ice shards themselves are affected.
spell.desc.storming_tiger:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Extender stack.§7

Invoke the spirit of the tiger and very rapidly strike enemies around you, dealing [calc:storming_tiger] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage.
spell.desc.omnislash:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Extender stack.§7

Channel your Brawler strength into eight rapid and fearsome strikes, with each hit briefly applying Stun and dealing [calc:omnislash] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.
spell.desc.asura:
§cRequires and consumes a Combo Extender stack.§7

Surpass your limits to damage nearby enemies for [calc:asura] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and yourself for [calc:asura_self] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.

§oIncreases to Damage and Critical Hits don't apply to Damage caused to self. You can still die from self-damage!§r
spell.desc.safeguard:
§6This buff is needed to gain Retribution stacks used in the other Crusader Skills!§7

Enhance yourself with the ability to defend your allies. Grants you Passive Block Chance, Health, and the chance to gain Retribution on successful blocks. §aYou can have up to 5 Retribution stacks.§7
spell.desc.holy_shield_throw:
Throw out a spiritual shield which deals [calc:holy_shield_throw] §c☀ Fire§7 and §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage in an area upon contact. The damage is also influenced by your Passive Block Chance.

§eRetribution§7: Consume a Retribution stack to also apply Judgment on enemies hit, causing them to gain increased Damage Taken.
spell.desc.persecutory_thrust:
Thrust your blade forward, channeling a piercing, holy beam which deals [calc:persecutory_thrust] §c☀ Fire§7 and §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage to enemies in your way. While channeling the beam, also deal [calc:persecutory_thrust_self] §c☀ Fire§7 and §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage to yourself.

§eRetribution§7: Consume a Retribution stack to prevent the beam from dealing damage to yourself.

§oIncreases to Damage and Critical Hits don't apply to Damage caused to self. You can still die from self-damage!§r
spell.desc.reckoners_flail:
Throw out an ignited chain which chains and hits additional enemies. Each hit from the chain deals [calc:reckoners_flail] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage and pulls them to you.

§eRetribution§7: Consume a Retribution stack to also apply Stun to all enemies hit for 3s.
spell.desc.comeuppance:
Slam your weapon into the ground to send out a shockwave which deals [calc:comeuppance] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage in a large area around you.

§eRetribution§7: Consume a Retribution stack to also slow and taunt enemies in the area.
spell.desc.fist_of_judgment:
Sacrifice your own Health, dealing [calc:fist_of_judgment_self] §c☀ Fire§7 and §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage to yourself to mark an area with your blood. After 3s, the marked area is slammed with the power of the Gods, §eknocking back§7 and dealing [calc:fist_of_judgment] §c☀ Fire§7 and §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage in an area.

§eRetribution§7: Consume a Retribution stack to also heal allies in the marked area for [calc:fist_of_judgment] Health.

§oIncreases to Damage and Critical Hits don't apply to Damage caused to self. You can still die from self-damage!§r
spell.desc.holy_immolation: Imbue your flames with Holy power. Holy Immolation sacrifices Burn Damage to give your Burn Ailment a chance to deal [calc:immolate] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area around the enemy on the initial Burn proc.
spell.desc.immolate: On the initial Burn proc, deal [calc:immolate] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area around the enemy.
spell.desc.prayer:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Prayer Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Prayer Effect, which provides Health and Magic Shield Restored Per Second.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time. You can also view the Prayer Effect in the Mine and Slash Library, available through the HUB.§7
spell.desc.blessed_aim:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Blessed Aim Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Blessed Aim Effect, which increases Critical Hit and Accuracy.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7
spell.desc.defiance:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Defiance Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Defiance Effect, which provides a bonuses to Armor and a small amount of Damage Reduction.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7
spell.desc.holy_shock:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Holy Shock Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Holy Shock Effect, which increases §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage and provides Physical to Lightning. Additionally, nearby enemies take [calc:holy_shock] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage every 2s.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7
spell.desc.fanaticism:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Fanaticism Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Fanaticism Effect, which increases Attack Speed, Cast Speed, Move Speed, and Roll Cooldown.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7
spell.desc.meditation:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Meditation Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Meditation Effect, which substantially increases Mana and Energy Regeneration.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7
spell.desc.concentration:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Concentration Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Concentration Effect, which increases Damage dealt.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7
spell.desc.redemption:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Redemption Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Redemption Effect, which provides substantial Health and Magic Shield on Kill.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7
spell.desc.salvation:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Salvation Aura on yourself. While active, nearby allies gain the Salvation Effect, which increases Elemental Resistances.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7
spell.desc.holy_fire:
Harness the power of divinity, applying the Holy Fire Aura on yourself. While active, nearby enemies take [calc:holy_fire] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage every 0.5s, and you take [calc:holy_fire_self] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage every 0.5s. This damage also scales off of your Max Health. If damage is dealt to yourself while below 25% Health, the Aura will remove itself.

§cYou can only have ONE Aura active at a time.§7

§oIncreases to Damage and Critical Hits don't apply to Damage caused to self. You can still die from self-damage!§r
spell.desc.zap:
Fire a small and quick projectile which chains once. Each hit deals [calc:zap] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage.

§aGenerates an §dAlpha§7 §astack upon cast. You can have up to 3§7 §dAlpha§7 §astacks.§7
spell.desc.cold_snap:
Crash an area in front of you with snow and ice, dealing [calc:cold_snap] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to enemies caught.

§aGenerates a §bBeta§7 §astack upon cast. You can have up to 3§7 §bBeta§7 §astacks.§7
spell.desc.time_dilation: Slow down time for everything but yourself, causing you to move quicker (relatively).
spell.desc.fusion: Using the power of technology, slam together an §dAlpha§7 and §bBeta§7 stack to generate a §eGamma§7 stack. You can have up to 3§7 §eGamma§7 stacks.
spell.desc.turbo: Extend yourself a bit past your limits to instantaneously generate an §dAlpha§7 and §bBeta§7 stack.
spell.desc.corporeal_respite: Partially phase out of the current dimension and delay oncoming §6☀ Physical§7 Damage. While phased, you gain Physical Damage Reduction but §6☀ Physical§7 Damage towards you always applies Bleed. Additionally, you take extra damage from Bleed.
spell.desc.timewinder:
Throw out a piercing ice shard that slows and deals [calc:timewinder] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to enemies hit. Upon expiry, the ice shard converts into an electric bolt and quickly returns to the cast position, piercing and dealing [calc:timewinder] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage to enemies hit. 

§dAlpha§7, §bBeta§7, and §eGamma§7 stacks are consumed upon Skill use.

§eDepending on the combination of effects, this Skill is modified:§7
Only §dAlpha§7: On hit, the ice shard also causes the enemy to take increased §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage for a short duration.
Only §bBeta§7: The ice shard continuously pulls nearby enemies towards it.
§dAlpha§7 + §bBeta§7: The ice shard leaves a trail of snow, which periodically slows and deals [calc:timewinder_floor] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage.

In addition to the above, §eGamma§7: Fire 2 additional projectiles.
spell.desc.phase_dive:
Toss out an imbued snowball which explodes on contact. Upon expiry, the snowball deals [calc:phase_dive] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to enemies in an area. 

§dAlpha§7, §bBeta§7, and §eGamma§7 stacks are consumed upon Skill use.

§eDepending on the combination of effects, this Skill is modified:§7
Only §dAlpha§7: Upon expiry, teleport to the snowball.
Only §bBeta§7: Upon expiry, teleport nearby enemies to the snowball.
§dAlpha§7 + §bBeta§7: In additional to dealing damage, also heal allies for [calc:phase_dive] Health.

In addition to the above, §eGamma§7: Upon expiry, the impacted area is showered with ice pellets, causing enemies to periodically take [calc:phase_dive_blizz] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage.
spell.desc.pulsar_singularity_trap:
Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches. Upon activation, the trap explodes, dealing [calc:pulsar_singularity_trap] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage in an area. 

§dAlpha§7, §bBeta§7, and §eGamma§7 stacks are consumed upon Skill use.

§eDepending on the combination of effects, this Skill is modified:§7
Only §dAlpha§7: The trap also deals [calc:pulsar_singularity_trap_half] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage.
Only §bBeta§7: The trap also applies Stun to enemies for 3s.
§dAlpha§7 + §bBeta§7: After exploding, the area is electrified, dealing [calc:pulsar_singularity_trap_half] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage to enemies every second.

In addition to the above, §eGamma§7: The trap pulls enemies hit towards it on explosion. Enemies hit also have their §eLightning§7 and §5Chaos§7 Resistances lowered.
spell.desc.parallel_convergence:
Bring together two dimensions in an area, causing a rift. Enemies caught in the area are slowed. 

§dAlpha§7, §bBeta§7, and §eGamma§7 stacks are consumed upon Skill use.

§eDepending on the combination of effects, this Skill is modified:§7
Only §dAlpha§7: Enemies in the area take [calc:parallel_convergence] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage every second.
Only §bBeta§7: Applies Stun to enemies in the area for 1s, every 2s.
§dAlpha§7 + §bBeta§7: Allies in the area heal for [calc:parallel_convergence] Health every second.

In addition to the above, §eGamma§7: Increases the area of the rift by 33%.
spell.desc.chronobreak:
Fracture time and space itself around you, causing random explosions to take place in the area. Each explosion deals [calc:chronobreak] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to nearby enemies. The area in which the explosions appear is not affected by modifiers to Area of Effect. However, the explosions themselves are affected. 

§dAlpha§7, §bBeta§7, and §eGamma§7 stacks are consumed upon Skill use.

§eDepending on the combination of effects, this Skill is modified:§7
Only §dAlpha§7: Enemies take [calc:chronobreak_extra] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage instead.
Only §bBeta§7: Explosions slow and apply Stun to enemies hit.
§dAlpha§7 + §bBeta§7: Enemies hit have their §bCold§7 and §eLightning§7 Resistances reduced for a 6s.

In addition to the above, §eGamma§7: The number of explosions is doubled.
spell.desc.double_strike: Rapidly slash enemies twice, dealing [calc:double_strike] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in front of you. Double Strike has a higher chance of Critically striking.
spell.desc.flicker_strike: Teleport forward a small distance, stopping at the nearest enemy in front of you if available, and deal [calc:flicker_strike] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in an area around you.
spell.desc.puncture: Thrust your weapon forward, piercing enemies in front of you for [calc:puncture] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage. Puncture has a higher chance of causing Bleed.
spell.desc.execute: Channel your strength into a mighty blow, dealing [calc:execute] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage with high chance of critically striking. Execute deals [calc:execute_double] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage while Invisible. Execute deals more damage to enemies on low Health.
mmorpg.stat.learn_whirling_blades: Level to Cloak of Hidden Blades
spell.desc.whirling_blades: Spawn a flurry of shadow blades that encircle you, dealing [calc:whirling_blades] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage and [calc:whirling_blades] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage every 0.5s to enemies around you.
spell.desc.piercing_dagger_throw:
Quickly toss out a dagger with great force, dealing [calc:piercing_dagger_throw] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to struck enemies. The thrown dagger pierces through enemies.

§cPiercing Dagger Throw has innate Poison Chance, but this is only applies if it deals §5☀ Chaos§7§c Damage.§7
spell.desc.snipe: Imbue your next shot with immense power, charging then dealing [calc:snipe] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to your target with high chance of critically striking. Enemies hit are §eknocked back§7. Snipe deals [calc:snipe_double] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage while Invisible. Snipe deals more damage to enemies near full Health.
spell.desc.fan_of_knives: Spew out knives in front of you, with each knife dealing [calc:fan_of_knives] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to enemies. Additional levels in Fan of Knives cause you to spew more knives.
spell.desc.ricochet_shot: Fire a magically-imbued arrow that chains three times, dealing [calc:ricochet_shot] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to struck enemies.
spell.desc.recoil_shot: Flip backwards while shooting an arrow that deals [calc:direct_arrow_hit] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and applies Wounds in an area.
spell.desc.backflip: Jump backwards to resposition yourself or escape danger.
spell.desc.sharpen: Empower nearby allies, increasing their Basic Attack Damage and Attack Speed.
spell.desc.smoke_bomb: Throw a smoke bomb onto the ground which upon impact, releases smoke to obscure you, causing you to lose Threat. Upon cast, gain Invisibility for a short duration, and substantially increase your Critical Hit, Dodge, and Move Speed for an even shorter duration.
